name: Rusty Jim's 60 Second Battles
description:
RUSTY JIM PRESENTS 60 Second Battles A Game for the Awful Summer Jam 2019

Rusty Jim's 60 Second Battles is a game where you must decide on your army's movements for the next 10 seconds of battle. Can you outwit your opponent and defeat the enemy?

Features:

  • Quick, tactical gameplay
  • Three different units!
  • No historical context!
  • See your orders play out at the same time as the enemy!
